title: Five times the athleisure look worked
text:
Maybe you, like us, thought tracksuits and leggings were just for athletes, running weekend errands or even going to the gym. But thanks to stylish celebrities around the world, tracksuits and leggings are now considered totally appropriate for all kinds of occasions, including fancy events.

It all depends on how you dress it up. Needless to say, this has become another trend to master.

Now, I’m sure you’re thinking of how this look can go wrong, but according to The Trend Spotter, to nail the athleisure look you need to mix function with fashion. You can do this by carefully considering what athleisure pieces you buy and how to integrate them into your regular wardrobe. “Blend fashion pieces such as jeans, a leather jacket or heels with activewear pieces such as sneakers, sweat pants or a sports bra, and you’ll create an interesting but well-balanced look.”
